name: Purushottam Dey
title: Jr. QA Engineer
about: I’m a detail-driven QA Engineer with a strong passion for ensuring high-quality, reliable software. I specialize in test automation, API testing, and validating complex systems, with hands-on experience across web and mobile applications. I enjoy improving test processes, building efficient test solutions, and continuously upskilling in modern technologies. Currently, I’m expanding my expertise in automation frameworks, cloud platforms, and scalable application testing.

experience.title: Jr. QA Engineer
experience.description: As a Qa Engineer, I am responsible for designing and executing test plans, identifying bugs, and ensuring the quality of software products through automated and manual testing.

projects.name: Clinical Application UI & Backend Testing
projects.description: Tested a healthcare clinical application involving patient management, lab results, and provider workflows. Validated UI functionality and backend data consistency from multiple external systems.

projects.name: Selenium Automation Test Suite
projects.description: Designed and developed a Selenium-based automation framework using POM and BDD principles to automate regression and smoke test cases for a clinical web application.

projects.name: HL7 Test Data Import & Validation Tool
projects.description: Built an internal testing tool to generate and import HL7 test data, enabling non-HL7 users to test patient and lab workflows without manual message creation.

projects.name: Mobile Clinical App Testing
projects.description: Performed functional, regression, and compatibility testing for iOS and Android clinical applications using real devices and cloud-based device farms.
